hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:The Prophet (ﷺ) asked some people to take an oath, and they hurried for it. The Prophet (ﷺ) ordered that lots should be drawn amongst them as to who would take an oath first

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا تَسَارَعَ قَوْمٌ فِي الْيَمِينِ
chapter.eng-name: If (some people have to take an oath) and each of them wants to take it first
